title: My conservative Christian relative said that all childfree people are immature and stupid, and then I pointed out that Jesus was childfree by choice.

author: ccwagwag
text: in fact, he was probably not child free. the new testament, as edited by later church, just doesn't mention his offspring.

author: Electricpants
text:
So editing around the topic means you can assume he HAD children?


So if I do not speak of having 4 legs you're going to assume I do?


Do you see how silly that logic is?

author: Disastrous_Student23
text: Why would they omit it if there was one? Seems justification for a group to maintain power over everyone else.  And even if he did have a child, during his ministry he would have been a deadbeat who abandoned his wife and child to go bum around with a bunch of bachelor fisherman.  Not exactly evidence that his love was child-dependent.
